text: The Mur (Slovenian, Croatian and Hungarian: Mura) is a river that flows through Austria, Slovenia, Hungary and Croatia. It has about long. The river starts in the Lungau region of the Austrian state of Salzburg. It ends at the mouth of the Drava near Legrad, Croatia. The largest city on the river is Graz, Austria. Category:Rivers of Austria Category:Rivers of Croatia Category:Rivers of Hungary Category:Rivers of Slovenia
title: Mur (river)
